name: JANA SWASTHYA SEVA SANSTHA (JSSS)
briefDescription: JANA SWASTHYA SEVA SANSTHA (JSSS) is a non-profit community based rural oriented State level Voluntary organization working towards empowering the poorest of the poor by addressing key issues on livelihood promotion, women empowerment, Health, Education, skill training and placement, aspires to improve the living conditions of the poor and marginalized by adopting strategies through community initiative, participation and sensitization. Registered on 12 November 1990, the organization has worked among backward communities in the interior unreached pockets of western parts of tribal Odisha, identified as one of the most under developed district in the state. Women self help groups have been taken as the base for all interventions.
